result.execSummary:
The defendant Bradley Ryan Glasener was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Bradley Ryan Glasener not in court.  Patrick D. Winter appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
cab
  The defendant is in absconder status.  The Court lifted the stay on condition time 15 DAYS and ordered a commitment to issue.  Filed, signed Order For Commitment For Condition Time For Non-Compliance With Probation Conditions.

Defendant Bradley Ryan Glasener in court with attorney Scott Paley Phillips Law Offices.  Owen M. Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Sentencing Proceeded. Statements by parties and defendant.
AS TO COUNT 1
The court sentenced the defendant to 75 DAYS in the House of Correction, consecutive to any other sentence, with credit for 2 DAYS time served, with full Huber privileges. Court STAYED sentence and placed defendant on PROBATION for 18 MONTHS.

CONDITIONS OF PROBATION
-Serve 30 DAYS as Condition Time, STAYED pending review.
-Batterers Intervention program, or a course in anger management -based on evaluation.
-Parenting classes.
-AODA assessment, comply with recommended treatment.
-Absolute sobriety, random urine screens.
-Treatment and/or counseling as determined by agent.
-No VIOLENT contact with victim, court orders NO co-habitation with the victim unless approved by the agent.
-Obtain/maintain employment.
-No contact with firearms.
-Pay all MANDATORY court costs, fees, and surcharges including: DNA & DV surcharges during period of probation, from bail, failure to pay will result in a civil judgment. 
-Court WAIVED all NON-Mandatory court costs, fees, and surcharges due to inability to pay.

*Court advised defendant of right to seek post conviction relief.
*Court advised defendant of penalties for violation of NO CONTACT ORDER.
*Court advised that under 48 USC Section 922(g)(9) the defendant is prohibited from possession of a firearm and/or ammunition after conviction of a crime of domestic violence.

Filed: 
-Pretrial Sentence Credit
-Notice of Right to Seek Post-Conviction Relief
-Memorandum of Conditions of Probation  Probation Review Hearing scheduled for November 20, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Bradley Ryan Glasener in court with attorney Scott Paley Phillips Law Offices.  Owen M. Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case set for Jury Trial. Parties have reached a resolution.
AS TO COUNT 1
Defendant changes plea(s) to GUILTY. Defendant examined as to plea, advised of Constitutional Rights and the maximum penalties. Court found that the defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived rights.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights form, received and filed. Parties stipulate to the Criminal Complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea(s).  Court found defendant GUILTY and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record. Case adjourned to branch 23 for Sentencing.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for June 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Bradley Ryan Glasener in court with attorney Scott Paley Phillips Law Offices.  Sarra Mae Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense counsel requests case be set for Jury Trial. All conditions of bail remain in effect. Court ordered all motions filed and discovery turned over 20 DAYS prior trial. Case adjourned for Jury Trial to branch 23.  Jury trial scheduled for May 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Cash bail that was previously posted to remain.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for 02-26-2015 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Bradley Ryan Glasener
Current: 1404 Milwaukee Avenue, Apt D, South Milwaukee, WI 53172   (Effective: 02-12-2015)
Prior: 1404 Milwaukee Avenue, Apt D, South Milwaukee, WI 53172
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Jessica V. and K.R.V. or the residence or place of employment and the cat

Defendant Bradley Ryan Glasener in court.  Kurt Brian Benkley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Grady, Branch 23.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant.
Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  The case is adjourned to Br.23  for a Pretrial Conference.vb
